[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 45]
Reasoning: **The Play: A Calculated Full House for Maximum Value**

Okay, here's the situation: Big Blind, round five, needing 1200 chips. I have $6 and three hands remaining. Let's see... the hand in front of me: two Queens, three Jacks, a King, a Glass Ace, and a Blue Seal 7 of Diamonds. The Mystic Summit joker gives a fat +15 Multi because I have no discards left, and that's *key*. The Smiley Face joker will be very effective since I'm going to play a hand full of face cards (+5 Mult per). The Spare Trousers joker gets +2 Mult if I play a Two Pair or a Full House, which I can, and plan on doing. I have the Luchador, which is polychrome and gives X1.5 Mult, and I also have the Constellation, which gives X1.1 Mult. Finally, I have the 7 of Diamonds (Blue Seal), which will provide a Planet Card at the end of the round.

First, I consider a Full House of Jacks and Queens. Jacks (Jc, Jd, Jh) and Queens (Qs, Qc). This hand will score a base 40 chips and will earn 10 chip for each card played. The base multi for a Full House is 4, plus the Smiley Face bonus (5 face cards * 5 = +25), plus the Mystic Summit (+15). The subtotal is 44 Mult. The Luchador is X1.5 Mult, and the Constellation is X1.1. So my total Mult is 44 * 1.5 * 1.1, which ends up being 72.6, so the total score is 90 * 72.6 = 6534. This is much higher than what I need to clear the Big Blind, so the Glass Ace remains unused for this round.

Now, wait... What about the Spare Trousers? The card description says "This Joker gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair." But this only works for *future* hands, not this one.

Let's check the alternative. If I play Two Pair (Queens and Jacks), it is base 20 chips, 2 mult, plus 71 chips from the card. Smiley Face with 4 face cards is +20, Mystic Summit is +15. # Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
select <pack_card_position> <hand_card_position1> <hand_card_position2> ... <hand_card_positionN> - Select a card from the booster pack. The hand card positions may be required depending on if the booster pack card selected needs targets. In 'Mega' booster packs that say 'choose 2 of N', make the selections one at a time. If you intend to select cards 1 and 3 for example, issue a 'select 1' command, then a 'select 2' command, because the 3rd card position will become the second position after selecting the first card.
skip_booster - Skip the remaining selections in the current booster pack.
